ValidationRule.description: Policy Question requests must be submitted by Zone level Roles (Zone Managers, Zone Assistants). Please work with your Zone Managers, Zone Assistants to request these changes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'Core Zone')), NOT($Profile.Name='HNBF EAST'), NOT($Profile.Name='HNBF WEST'), NOT($Profile.Name='HRS INTERNAL WHOLESALER MANAGER'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS ZONE')), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'MMS REGION')), NOT($Profile.Name='MSP ZONE 1'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PEO ZONE')), NOT($Profile.Name='VIRTUAL SALES AND NSS'), NOT($Profile.Name='Sales Engineering'), NOT($Profile.Name='Strategic Accounts Manager'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')),
$RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case',
ISPICKVAL(Type,'Policy Question') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Policy Question requests must be submitted by Zone Managers, Zone Assistants. Please work with your Zone Managers, Zone Assistants to request these changes.
